mapper.select: SELECT au.id_ AS userId, au.name_ AS name, au.gender_ AS gender, au.emp_no AS empNo, au.account_ AS account, au.admin_ as admin, ad.id_ AS departmentId, ad.name_ AS departmentName, case when ad.parent_id = 0 then concat('&', ad.id_) else concat(ad.tree_position, '&', ad.id_) end as userTreePositionId FROM resource_station_group_user su INNER JOIN admin_user au ON au.enable_ = 1 and au.id_ = su.user_id INNER JOIN admin_department ad ON ad.enable_ = 1 and ad.id_ = au.department_id WHERE su.station_group_id = #{stationGroupId} order by userTreePositionId asc

SELECT au.id_ AS userId, au.name_ AS name, au.gender_ AS gender, au.emp_no AS empNo, au.account_ AS account, au.admin_ as admin, ad.id_ AS departmentId, ad.name_ AS departmentName, case when ad.parent_id = 0 then concat('&', ad.id_) else concat(ad.tree_position, '&', ad.id_) end as userTreePositionId FROM admin_user au INNER JOIN admin_department ad ON ad.enable_ = 1 and ad.id_ = au.department_id WHERE au.enable_ = 1 and au.id_ not in ( SELECT su.user_id FROM resource_station_group_user su where su.station_group_id = #{stationGroupId} ) order by userTreePositionId asc

SELECT au.id_ AS userId, au.name_ AS name, au.gender_ AS gender, au.emp_no AS empNo, au.account_ AS account, au.admin_ as admin, ad.id_ AS departmentId, ad.name_ AS departmentName, case when ad.parent_id = 0 then concat('&', ad.id_) else concat(ad.tree_position, '&', ad.id_) end as userTreePositionId FROM admin_user au INNER JOIN admin_department ad ON ad.enable_ = 1 and ad.id_ = au.department_id and ad.id_ in ( select d.id_ from admin_department d where d.enable_ = 1 and d.id_ = #{departmentId} or d.tree_position like concat('%', #{departmentId}, '%') ) WHERE au.enable_ = 1 order by userTreePositionId asc
